articles.title: 'Karnataka to grow bamboo on 57k hectares'
articles.description: Karnataka will grow bamboo on 57,000 hectares in the state in the next two years, said forest minister Umesh V Katti.

articles.description: महाराष्ट्र में हाई वोल्टेज ड्रामे के बीच अब फ्लोर टेस्ट पर सभी की निगाहें टिकी हैं। मुमकिन है कि अब जल्द ही गुवाहाटी में मौजूद एकनाथ शिंदे के धड़े वाले विधायक मुंबई लौटें और बहुमत परीक्षण में हिस्सा लें।

articles.title: Fed's Powell says commitment to curbing inflation is 'unconditional'
articles.description: "It's unconditional," Powell told the U.S. House of Representatives Financial Services Committee when asked about the Fed's commitment to fight inflation that, by the central bank's preferred measure, is running at more than three times its 2% target.
